name: Erlend
description:
Erlend is one of the Asgardians that can briefly be seen in the game God of War: Ragnarök during Atreus' adventure in Asgard
God of War series[]
During Atreus’ tour in Asgard with Odin, they venture to The Great Lodge, while passing through, they cross paths with an Asgardian named Erlend, he is seen sitting on a bench with another Asgardian. The All-Father asks him to try and stay awake for him. Beyond this scene we do not see him again. He won't get mentioned again either.
Personality[]
There is almost nothing known about Erlend, as he only briefly appeared.
